Key Match Events: Isaac Paredes hit a two-run single to help the Cubs win 2-1 against the Yankees
Post-Match Reflections: Cubs manager Craig Counsell said that Paredes' win-delivering single was a big day for the team and that helping his team win always makes him feel good
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cubs won the game 2-1, salvaging a game in the three-game set against the Yankees
Others: Isaac Paredes had an 0-for-14 drought in his previous five games before hitting the two-run single
